scripts.pretest: echo 'make sure to compile plugins!' && tsc tests/*.ts tests/plugins/*.ts --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --module umd --allowJs --esModuleInterop --noEmitOnError -t ES2017 --moduleResolution node --outdir tests/build
scripts.test-init: echo npm run pretest && tests/test-in-vm.sh tests/build/tests/initial-load-test.js
scripts.test-plugins: echo npm run pretest && tests/test-in-vm.sh tests/build/tests/plugins/plugin-test.js
scripts.test-plugins-debug: echo not yet working npm run pretest && tests/plugins/test-in-vm.sh -d tests/build/tests/plugins/plugin-test.js
scripts.test-plugins-watch: when-changed -k -1 -s tests/plugins/*.ts src/plugins/* -c npm run test-plugins
scripts.test-plugins-debug-watch: echo not yet working when-changed -k 1 -s tests/plugins/*.ts src/plugins* -c npm run test-plugins-debug
scripts.release: npm run build-prod && rm chrome-extension/dist/plugins/*.tmp.js && zip -r lipsurf.zip chrome-extension/
